metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36228 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An integer underflow was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading to a slapd crash in the Certificate List Exact Assertion processing, resulting in denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldap-common - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldap2 - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd-contrib - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
